page.title: 02F of D Coleford 1
page.content: Population-4281-1980 census.It has a thousand year history-first mentioned though in 1275.2{banks,post office, {chemist,3 supermarkets,2 newsagents,2 {grocers,2 bakeries,health {food,material,clothes,ironmongers,flor {ists}and{three electrical shops}are grouped round centre of Coleford.There is a {cinema(recently renovated)and {Forest of Dean Newspapers Office}plus other shops.You can have{fish and {chips,a Chinese or Indian}meal(opened this year)eat in or take away,stay at {The Angel Hotel,Bell's Club}or various {guest houses}in the area.Coleford is an administrative centre{Forest of {Dean District Council.Magistrate's {court,police,ambulance}and{fire {station.Anglican,Baptist,United {Reformed,Assemblies of God,Roman {Catholic}Churches.Many people move into the area.
